meanings.definition: To move (something) slightly in order to achieve the desired fit.
examples: He smoothed his hair and adjusted the knot in his tie.

images.alt: Photo of a man adjusting his tie.
images.description: A man wearing a suit, adjusting his tie.
images.caption: A man wearing a suit and adjusting his tie.

examples: We investigated the area carefully by using binoculars and by asking others.

images.alt: Photo of a person looking through binoculars.
images.description: A person using binoculars, looking between two tall stacks of books.
images.caption: Binoculars can help you see details of something that is far away.

source.title: Anonymous person with binoculars looking through stacked books
source.author: Andrea Piacquadio

meanings.definition: A distinctive quality or trait of something.
examples: One feature of Clusive is the word lookup. What other features can you find?

meanings.definition: To design (something) to meet someone's individual preference.
examples: The way Clusive appears is personalized just for you.

images.alt: Photo of mom putting face mask on girl.
images.description: A mom putting a face mask on her daughter. The face mask has a cat mouth, nose and whiskers printed on it.
images.caption: This mask is personalized with a cat face printed on it.

source.title: Mother Putting a Face Mask on her Daughter
source.author: August de Richelieu

examples: He smoothed his hair and changed how his tie was laying on his shirt.

images.alt: Photo of a man adjusting his tie.
images.description: A man wearing a suit, adjusting his tie.
images.caption: A man wearing a suit and changing the position of his tie.

examples: We explored the area carefully by using binoculars and by asking others.

images.caption: Binoculars can help you see details of something that is far away.

meanings.definition: Something used to carry out a particular task.
examples: One tool in Clusive is the word lookup. What other tools can you find?

meanings.definition: To design (something) to meet someone's individual preference.
examples: The way Clusive appears is customized just for you.

images.description: A mom putting a face mask on her daughter. The face mask has a cat mouth, nose and whiskers printed on it.
images.caption: This mask is customized with a cat face printed on it.
